official-title.#text:
Expressing support for the designation of
		  the fourth week in April as

sponsor.#tail:
submitted the following resolution; which was referred to
			 the
sponsor.#text:
Mr. Danny K. Davis of
			 Illinois

text.#text:
honors and
			 recognizes the importance of promoting healthy lifestyles for children.

quote.#tail:
will act as
			 a focal point for year-round programing related to the Nation’s childhood
			 obesity epidemic as well as its solutions, including sound nutrition, regular
			 physical activity, and health-promoting school programs; and

to bring national
			 attention to the importance of keeping kids fit and healthy, and to provide an
			 opportunity to emphasize the significance of making the choices necessary to
			 sustain a healthy and physically active lifestyle: Now, therefore, be it

text.#text:
Whereas the fourth week in April would be an appropriate
			 week to designate as

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 226 IH: Expressing support for the designation of the fourth week in April as “Every Kid Healthy Week”.
